title: Two Evil Eyes - Dario Argento / George Romero / DVD9  (Disc 1)

Uploaded by request. Ripped from the 2-disc limited edition DVD from Blue-Underground

George Romero and Dario Argento - bring you an unprecedented pair of shockers inspired by the tales of Edgar Allan Poe. 

The Facts In The Case Of Mr. Valdemar - Romero 
A conniving wife (Adrienne Barbeau) and her lover use a hypnotic trance to embezzle a fortune from her dying husband, only to receive some chilling surprises from beyond the grave. 

The Black Cat - Argento 
A deranged crime scene photographer (Harvey Keitel) is driven to brutal acts of madness and murder by his girlfriend&#039;s new pet. But will this cunning feline deliver a final sickening twist of its own?

 

Encoded with DVD-shrink. Untouched DVD9. 
But please seed after DL, cause i have lots of sweet movies to upload..
